column4: Lobbying and corporate influence safeguard society and the environment
To reach a sustainable future, every company must commit to not influence market dynamics in ways that may contribute to negative social, environmental or governance impacts on society.
Companies can show this commitment by tracking their political contributions and industry group memberships, and making these visible to the public.
